description: This header file defines an interface for CCSP support in a telemetry component, including function declarations for initialization, parameter retrieval, profile management, and event registration.

methods.name: isCCSPInitialized
methods.description: Checks whether the CCSP subsystem has been initialized.

methods.name: getCCSPParamVal
methods.description: Retrieves the value of a specified CCSP parameter.

methods.name: getCCSPProfileParamValues
methods.description: Fetches a vector of parameter values from the CCSP profile based on a provided list.

methods.name: registerCcspT2EventListener
methods.description: Registers a callback for telemetry events within CCSP.
